PushingListenerAdapterListener
ListenersListener
Baseclass of a IPushingListener that enables a Receiver to receive messages from Servlets.
See also
Github - PushingListenerAdapterListener Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.http.PushingListenerAdapter
Syntax
Copy
<PushingListenerAdapterListener />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
Name of the listener as known to the adapter
applicationFaultsAsExceptions	boolean	-
onException	options	RETHROW
When an exception happens in the execution of the pipeline, with RETHROW the exception is thrown to the caller. With FORMAT_AND_RETURN the exception is processed by the Adapter.setErrorMessageFormatter(IErrorMessageFormatter) and returned as result-mes
